name: Parallel Fates
description:
A game created in 4 days for the 2021 Community Jam.

A rogue-like shooter where you fight the same boss 3 times, but every time you defeat them, a mysterious random fate befalls you.

If you die once, the entire game restarts.

Every run is unique with various fate combinations that befall the player.

Destiny dictates whether this will be a cake walk or a hellish journey.
